value.title: Meadows: ‘Still optimistic’ Trump will leave hospital later on Monday
value.excerpt: Trump's chief of staff said the president will meet with his doctors and nurses on Monday morning to assess his progress.

value.title: Alec Baldwin defends portraying Donald Trump on 'SNL' while president is hospitalized
value.excerpt: Alec Baldwin says he wouldn't have reprised his role as President Donald Trump on "SNL" while Trump was hospitalized if he was "truly, gravely ill."

value.title: Top Israeli rabbis, and U.S. envoy, pray for Trump recovery
value.excerpt: Israel's rabbis prayed for U.S. President Donald Trump to recover from COVID-19 on Monday, invoking his name in a Jewish holiday ceremony at Jerusalem's Western Wall.

value.title: Australia shares jump 2% on jobs stimulus, Trump's health progress
value.excerpt: Australian shares rose more than 2% on Monday after the government announced plans to earmark additional wage subsidies to help spur employment, and as investors continued to hope for a swifter recovery of U.

value.title: Trump said to be improving but next 48 hours 'critical'
value.excerpt: President Donald Trump says in a video from his hospital quarters that he is feeling better as he battles the novel coronavirus and hopes to “be back soon.”

value.title: 'The Squad' Responds to Twitter Policy Banning Posts Wishing for Trump's Death: 'Excuse Me?'
value.excerpt: "So... you mean to tell us you could've done this the whole time?" Congresswoman Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez tweeted.

value.title: Was Trump ever on oxygen? Health, security experts say America needs 'total honesty' on president's condition
value.excerpt: Dr. Sean Conley created confusion about President Trump's COVID-19 diagnosis, which national security and health experts say is unnecessary.

value.title: An unusual patient, an unusual treatment: Trump and the risks of 'VIP syndrome'
value.excerpt: "When a patient is high profile, there's a temptation to break away from the standard medical care that you would give to any other patient -- and sometimes to the disadvantage to the patient, the VIP,

value.title: If Trump's symptoms started before Friday, he may have been highly infectious during the debate
value.excerpt: People can be contagious before showing COVID-19 symptoms. Depending on when Trump's started, he might have been infectious when debating Biden.

value.title: Barack Obama wishes 'speedy recovery' to President Trump, Melania 'no matter our party'
value.excerpt: Former President Barack Obama is calling for unity and compassion following President Donald Trump's COVID-19 diagnosis.

value.title: Commentary: What happens if Trump is ‘unable’ to govern
value.excerpt: For some imaginable health outcomes, especially those associated with COVID-19, the 25th Amendment is ambiguous.

value.title: White House Says Trump ‘Remains Fatigued’ Amid Reports He Has Fever
value.excerpt: Trump also took a dose of an experimental antibody cocktail that hasn’t yet been given emergency use authorization by the FDA.

value.title: Trump has more in common with Lincoln than you might think
value.excerpt: Lincoln governed during the most divided era in our nation’s history — Trump is governing in the most acrimonious period since.

value.title: 'This was avoidable': Trump has been downplaying the virus from the start
value.excerpt: In recent weeks, Trump has put himself and others at risk by holding mass gatherings, some indoors, and shunning mask use while claiming the end of the virus was just around the corner.

value.title: AP PHOTOS: A busy week for Trump before positive virus test
value.excerpt: With just a month to go until the election, President Donald Trump had a busy schedule the days before he tested positive for the coronavirus, attending rallies, private fundraisers, a presidential debate and hosting events at the White House.

value.title: Pete Wilson endorses Trump, says president has 'very good judgment'
value.excerpt: Wilson was among nearly seven dozen members of past GOP administrations and Congress who backed Trump in a signed letter.

value.title: Trump says he'll overturn 'ridiculous' gender-neutral Navy terms
value.excerpt: The Navy had made the changes to the two elite units' ethos and creed because the terms were outdated and because of the potential for women to join the units.

value.title: Trump slams Navy SEAL orders to use gender-neutral language, calls it 'ridiculous'
value.excerpt: The change would have altered the Navy SEAL creed from "a common man" to "common citizens."

value.title: Trump ‘Bears Responsibility’ For Debate Unraveling, Chris Wallace Says
value.excerpt: Wallace cited a Fox News’ analysis that found President Trump interrupted Joe Biden’s answers or Wallace’s questions 145 times during the debate on Tuesday.

value.title: Trump 'Will Not Accept Any Result That Is Not A Victory,' 'Atlantic' Writer Says
value.excerpt: Atlantic writer Barton Gellman says the 2020 election could trigger a constitutional crisis: "This is not going to be a normal election. ... Preserving its legitimacy is going to take extra effort."

value.title: Donald Trump made an unsuccessful push to cash out his $800 million stake in 2 valuable office skyscrapers
value.excerpt: The New York Times found Trump erased nearly all his federal taxes in the 15 years prior to the 2016 election. But he could be on the hook for an upcoming $100 million tax bill.

value.title: McMaster sees Trump 'aiding and abetting' Russia's election efforts
value.excerpt: Former White House National Security Adviser H.R. McMaster has been careful not to criticize Donald Trump. That's just now starting to change.

value.title: NATO insiders believe Trump's tax and debt problems make him vulnerable to blackmail by foreign powers
value.excerpt: "Everything about his finances smells like blood and we are trained to be sharks," one source told Insider.

value.title: Here’s how Kamala Harris puts the nail in the Trump-Pence coffin
value.excerpt: Harris has essentially five tasks. Keep in mind that we should expect a much smaller audience for next week’s event and that the vice-presidential faceoff has never affected the outcome of the presidential contest.

value.title: Texas Christian on Trump: 'he sounds just like me'
value.excerpt: Top News Texas Christian on Trump: 'he sounds just like me' Posted . In a golf cart decked out with a "Trump 2020" flag, Bernadette McLeroy and her husband tout President Donald T

value.title: A step-by-step look at Trump's falsehoods on mail-in voting: Analysis
value.excerpt: Dissecting the president’s stream-of-consciousness and incomplete sentences on the subject is difficult, but here are some key facts and context around his statements.

value.title: Trump falsely claims 'poll watchers' blocked from observing early voting sites in Philadelphia
value.excerpt: President Trump falsely claimed that "poll watchers" were blocked from entering early voting locations in Philadelphia, an issue his campaign and the RNC are litigating.

value.title: Sen. Chuck Grassley: 'I'd be very concerned' about how Donald Trump's tax returns got out
value.excerpt: Asked about the substance of the New York Times' reporting that Trump paid $750 in income tax in 2016 and 2017, Grassley said he doesn't have enough evidence.

value.title: Livestream: Donald Trump Rallies In Duluth, Minnesota Wednesday
value.excerpt: The Trump campaign is asking Minnesota rallygoers to "please wear a mask while riding on the shuttle service.​"

value.title: Biden kicks off train tour through Ohio, Pennsylvania after raucous debate
value.excerpt: Joe Biden is embarking on a roughly 200-mile train tour on Wednesday through Ohio and Pennsylvania, appealing to voters who have strayed from Democrats in recent years.
